wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Anthony Kershaw  (14 December 1915 – 29 April 2008) was a British Conservative MP for 32 years, from 1955 to 1987.  He served as a junior minister in the 1970s.  He was also a barrister, World War II cavalry officer, amateur rugby player and company director.
